metadata.subject: Louis XVI, King of France, 1754-1793
metadata.title: Journal de ce qui s'est passé à la tour du Temple, pendant la captivité de Louis XVI, roi de France /
metadata.creator: Cléry, M., 1759-1809.

metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Skewed text. Damaged pages. Inconsistent page size. Page numbering errors. Irregular pagination.
